scripts.dev:docker: docker compose create && docker compose start
scripts.database: npm run database:create && npm run database:load && npm run database:import
scripts.database:create: npm run database:create:database && npm run database:create:extension
scripts.database:drop: echo drop database norway_data | docker exec -i postgis /usr/bin/psql --user postgres postgres
scripts.database:create:database: echo create database norway_data | docker exec -i postgis /usr/bin/psql --user postgres postgres
scripts.database:create:extension: echo create extension postgis | docker exec -i postgis /usr/bin/psql --user postgres norway_data
scripts.database:import: docker exec -i postgis /usr/bin/psql --user postgres norway_data < database/import-norway-data.sql
